text: Elizabeth DePalma Digeser is a historian of Christianity who is a faculty member at the University of California, Santa Barbara. Her work focuses on late antiquity. ==Works== * * ==References== Category:Living people Category:University of California, Santa Barbara faculty Category:Historians of Christianity Category:Historians of the Roman Empire Category:21st-century American historians Category:21st-century American non-fiction writers Category:21st-century American women writers Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Elizabeth DePalma Digeser
